body: @ayami123 The connection between them is that Aoi is the Artist of Taimanin Arena ero images, and as he has Liliana as his O.C(original character) he decided to put Liliana in a ninja suit, soo he made an agreement with the game devs and an event in game was made where if you complete it you'd receive(as all the other missions) a sex scene, but this sex scene was about Liliana and Tatsuya making love, and in that scene as for the world where Liliana and Tatsuya are "Taimanin no Asagi" is nothing more than a fictional game and in the sex scene she says something alike this "tatsuya, I boight this suit, do you like it?" , so rest assured, even inside the game in this scene for liliana and tatsuya universe, there is nothing like such Demons and taimanins fighting against them, so you can rest in peace cuz this is not canon and after some time the event was removed from the game since (as I think) Aoi didn want people to think and relate Liliana and Tatsuya to the Taimanin series
Any back story for Liliana ? I mean come on, I'm Quite Interested with the connection to Taimanin as seen in the Taimanin Arena
God i wish this artist would make new material with these girls ^w^
